DOC.brief_summary: Many patient exhaustion disorder continue significant difficulty attention memory function reduce work ability . This randomized study investigate whether addition 12-week period specific cognitive training physical fitness training could enhance cognitive function patient exhaustion disorder participate multimodal rehabilitation program .
DOC.detailed_description: This study perform The Stress Rehabilitation Clinic University hospital Umeå . In total 161 patient diagnosed exhaustion disorder recruit consecutively study March 2010 June 2013 . Participants age span 18-60 year old , ongoing employment assess suitable 24-week multimodal rehabilitation , consist cognitive behavioural therapy group ( maximum eight person ) , prescription physical activity/exercise ( FaR© ) vocational measure rehabilitation meeting . A randomization group perform 12 week multimodal rehabilitation one three condition ; A/ continue multimodal rehabilitation , B/ addition computer-based cognitive training , C/ addition physical fitness training . The added training perform last 12 week rehabilitation ( week 12 24 ) three weekly training occasion . Primary endpoint change cognitive functioning , estimate global brain score . Secondary endpoint change different specific neuropsychological task , estimate psychological wellbeing , physical capacity , work ability , health-related quality life cost-effectiveness . A long-term follow-up perform one year termination intervention ( week 76 ) .
DOC.criteria: Confirmed exhaustion disorder accord criterion establish Swedish National Board Health Welfare 18 60 year age Current employment Considered suitable multimodal rehabilitation group Need treatment rehabilitation Abuse alcohol drug Participation another intervention study
